title: Magi: Sinbad no Bouken (TV) (Magi: Adventure of Sinbad)
synopsis: In the small, impoverished Tison Village of the Parthevia Empire, a boy, Sinbad, is born to the jaded ex-soldier Badr and his kind-hearted wife Esra. His birth creates a radiant surge throughout the rukh, a declaration of a singularity to those who stand at the pinnacle of magical might: the "Child of Destiny" is here. Despite his country being plagued by economic instability and the repercussions of war, Sinbad leads a cheerful lifeâ€”until a stranger's arrival shatters his peaceful world, and tragedy soon befalls him.
related_anime: ['Magi: Sinbad no Bouken', 'Magi: The Labyrinth of Magic']
